de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.columnwise

Class AttributeWiseVarianceNormalization<V extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.AbstractConversionFilter<I,O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.AbstractVectorConversionFilter<V,V>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.AbstractNormalization<V>
          • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.columnwise.AttributeWiseVarianceNormalization<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vector type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Normalization<V>, ObjectFilter

    @Alias(value={"de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.AttributeWiseVarianceNormalization","z","de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.AttributeWiseVarianceNormalization"})
public class AttributeWiseVarianceNormalization<V extends NumberVector>
extends AbstractNormalization<V>
    Class to perform and undo a normalization on real vectors with respect to given mean and standard deviation in each dimension.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
